Articles.Content:
@KospY I love your mod! it is simply fantastic and should be stock in my opinion. As the title suggests, have you considered adding a 3D printer to the arsenal of tools Engineers can use? Real life space exploration is seriously considering using 3D printers in space. This reduces the need to plan for redundancies upon redundancies by carrying extra parts and tools that may* be needed. Instead the parts can simply be made on the fly as required. Something to think about!

 

-Leafy
